name: perl-moose

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A postmodern object system for Perl 5

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-class-load-xs
dependencies.description: This module provides an XS implementation for portions of Class::Load.

dependencies.name: perl-cpan-meta-check
dependencies.description:
This module verifies if requirements described in a CPAN::Meta object
are present..

dependencies.name: perl-devel-globaldestruction
dependencies.description: Makes Perl's global destruction less tricky to deal with

dependencies.name: perl-devel-overloadinfo
dependencies.description: Returns information about overloaded operators for a given class

dependencies.name: perl-devel-stacktrace
dependencies.description: An object representing a stack trace.

dependencies.name: perl-eval-closure
dependencies.description: Safely and cleanly create closures via string eval

dependencies.name: perl-module-runtime-conflicts
dependencies.description: Provide information on conflicts for Module::Runtime

dependencies.name: perl-package-deprecationmanager
dependencies.description: Manage deprecation warnings for your distribution

dependencies.name: perl-package-stash-xs
dependencies.description: Faster and more correct implementation of the Package::Stash API

dependencies.name: perl-test-cleannamespaces
dependencies.description:
This module lets you check your module's namespaces for imported
functions you might have forgotten to remove

dependent_to.name: perl-moosex-emulate-class-accessor-fast
dependent_to.description: Emulate Class::Accessor::Fast behavior using Moose attributes

dependent_to.name: perl-catalyst-component-instancepercontext
dependent_to.description: Moose role to create only one instance of component per context

dependent_to.name: perl-moosex-getopt
dependent_to.description: A Moose role for processing command line options

dependent_to.name: roary
dependent_to.description: Rapid large-scale prokaryote pan genome analysis

dependent_to.name: perl-data-visitor
dependent_to.description: Visitor style traversal of Perl data structures
